channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Gravel and road dirt, 15th August
item.description:
The cycle path is covered in loose gravel and road dirt which is particularly dangerous where the toucan crossing meets the cycle path near the fire station. It is much safer having the dedicated cycle/footpath along from Churchdown to Golden Valley roundabout to use but it needs to have regular road sweeper along it to maintain it too.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Green or amber traffic light is not working problem, 15th August
item.description:
